snippet: The man accused of killing three relatives of the Oscar winner Jennifer Hudson did not take the stand, and his lawyers put on a mere 30-minute defense on Tuesday.
abstract: Defense rests after 30 minutes in the Chicago murder trial of William Balfour, who is accused of shooting actress Jennifer Hudson's mother, brother and nephew; Balfour, Hudson's former brother-in-law, did not take the stand.
lead_paragraph: The man accused of killing three relatives of the Oscar winner Jennifer Hudson did not take the stand, and his lawyers put on a mere 30-minute defense on Tuesday.

headline.main: Illinois: Defense Rests Quickly in Killings of Actress’s Relatives
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Defense Rests Quickly In Killings of Actress’s Relatives
